author: austwood
title: Nice pieces, but...
review:
I bought this set for the white wedge wing pieces that I use alot.

The jet when built is very chunky, but very sturdy to handle agressive play.  Most creator flying machines turn out to be too clunky for me.  oh well.  This is still very cool for a small set and contains some great pieces for creative building.  I just can't say no to a LEGO airplane...(except the new ones with the huge swooshy studless fuselages...blehh!)

(Actually I think i can say no to the new Indiana Jones flying wing set too.  I just can't handle that giant one piece wing)

Buy this set!

author: parchioso
title: It can be more useful than it seems to be - when MOC enabled
review:
The three models are nice but not really impressive, but this set actually contains a good combination of parts that can be used to build something else - such as a MOC mini Starfighter.

Please check out my blog entry for a pictorial review, as well as the MOC built only using parts from this set, and used them all:

http://brickand.me/2009/12/14/Lego6741MiniJetBasedMOCMiniStarfighterAndSetReview.aspx

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Creator - Mini Jet Review
review:
This is a really nice little set to have and it's fun to play with as well. The build is very easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers. This set may doesn't have any play features but we get 2 more models you can build with the pieces of this set. This plane is very easy to maneuver as well. As I told you in the beginning: It's a nice little set to have - even for the pieces which you can use for brickfilms and/or MOC's (My own creations) for sure.

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

Videos I made of this set:

Stopmotion 1
Stopmotion 2
Stopmotion 3
Review

author: LEGOwikiguy
title: Mini jet flies past other Creator sets...
review:
So much I can say about this perfect and well-priced set: detailed, even though small...well, here are the Pros and Cons:

Pros:
1. This set may be small, but it is has great details, including small engines
2. Very sturdy, parts barely break off!
3. Portable jet that can turn into a rocket or boat (Who wouldn't want this set?)

Cons:
1. Only one: the front nose will sometimes break off, but its not really that fragile

I recommend this set to anyone! It's an easy build, and anyone will love it (Especially with another small Creator set, such as the Mini Robots) Gets a 5/5!

author: CortezTheKiller
title: Good things come in small packages
review:
All three craft in this design are good, but the primary jet option looks awesome - despite its diminutive size.  Easily the best-looking of all the 'mini' range.

Pros

  • Nice design and colours
  • All three build options are good

Cons

  • None

author: stevanooz
title: miniature of the big one...
review:
if you ever buy Creator Sonic Boom, then maybe this is the miniature of that model. Looks a bit different, but I believe is the same style.

 

it can be built to another plane model and a boat. Every model look nice in small size. If you have a lot of imagination, you can built it to another model again. I can even built to small snow mobile. Believe me, you can built much more just with small number of bricks.

 

I can't say more about the mini products of Creater themes. But if you're a collector and like to show or even put this mini on your card dashboard. This collection of mini surely attract some attetion better than your bobble head in your car.

 

You won't regret buy this mini set. In fact, you maybe want to buy 3 set of this and create 3 different model and show it. It will looks good on your dashbord... :)

author: Drumlum
title: Good for a little bit...
review:
Being as this set is a smaller set, it can't really deliver the experience like the big version could. Being a fan of Creator, I got this set I wanted to get 5762: Mini Plane too. Both pretty cool to fly around, but then...well... It gets boring. Usually you get that feeling after you've built all three of the models: The main jet, the space shuttle and the speedboat. Its not much of a waste of money. This set would be a great stocking stuffer or party favor for LEGO fans so for that I can recommend it. 

  • Pros
Small, lightweight.
Has it's own plastic box to store it in, so its good for travel.
Quick, easy to build.
Creator set. You can build three additional vehicles with it.
Swooshable.
Good accuracy for a small set.

  • Cons
Gets boring after a week of swooshing.
Costs a little bit more than what I would pay for it (if I had my choice).

author: Snail
title: Nice little Jet
review:
For such a small set, this is well formed and has nice little details, jet fire, air intakes, a rounded cockpit and fine body work. only the vertical stablizers at the back are too clunky for the rest of the model, some special parts might have been better there.

Parts are fairly standard, but used well.

Playability is good as it is very sturdy and does not break apart (of course it has no functions at all).

Got this in a bulk, so i can't really judge value for money.
